levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Fails to demonstrate an understanding of the topic

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Demonstrates a limited understanding of the topic, with unclear or insufficient analysis

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Demonstrates a basic understanding of the topic, with some basic analysis

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Demonstrates a good understanding of the topic, with mostly clear analysis

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Demonstrates a deep understanding of the topic, with clear and insightful analysis

criteria.title: Identification of Personal and Societal Problems

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Fails to identify or analyse personal and societal problems resulting from obesity

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Attempts to identify and analyse personal and societal problems resulting from obesity, but is unclear or incomplete

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Identifies and analyses some personal and societal problems resulting from obesity, but lacks detail or clarity

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Clearly identifies and analyses both personal and societal problems resulting from obesity, but may lack some detail or depth

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Clearly and thoroughly identifies and analyses both personal and societal problems resulting from obesity

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Does not use evidence to support analysis

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Uses insufficient or irrelevant evidence to support analysis

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Uses limited or somewhat relevant evidence to support analysis

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Uses some relevant and credible evidence to support analysis

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Uses a range of relevant and credible evidence to support analysis

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Essay is disorganised and unclear, with no strong topic sentences or transitions

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Essay is poorly organised and unclear, lacking strong topic sentences and transitions

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Essay is somewhat organised and clear, but may lack strong topic sentences and transitions

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Essay is mostly organised and clear, with some strong topic sentences and transitions

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Essay is well-organised and clear, with strong topic sentences and transitions

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Severe errors in grammar or mechanics that make the essay incomprehensible

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Many errors in grammar or mechanics that impede understanding

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Some errors in grammar or mechanics that do not significantly impede understanding

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Few minor errors in grammar or mechanics

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: No errors in grammar or mechanics
